story.title: My Story
story.p1: Hi! I’m Mowlid Abdinor. Originally from Somalia, I am a software developer and a technology enthusiast currently pursuing my degree at Mehmet Akif Ersoy University. My journey started with a degree in Internet and Network Technologies, which gave me a deep understanding of system infrastructure. Now, I am about to complete my studies in Information Systems and Technologies.
story.p2: I combine my technical background with modern software solutions to build professional projects. I don’t just write code; I build digital solutions including Web Development (Designing and coding user-friendly, fast, and modern web interfaces) and Mobile App Development (Creating high-performance applications for both Android and iOS).
story.p3: Here are the tools and languages I use to bring ideas to life: C#, JavaScript, Python, PHP, ASP.NET Core, React, HTML5, CSS3, Flutter / React Native, MySQL, Firebase, Network Management. I am truly passionate about my work. For me, transforming complex problems into simple and elegant software is more than just a job—it’s a mission.
